description.en:
MetaMUI Blockchain is the world’s first blockchain that enables identity-based transfer between users through DID (Decentralized Identity).
This identity-based transfer mechanism fully complies with KYC/AML and FATF(Financial Action Task Force)’s recommendation 15 of FATF’s recommendation to virtual assets and virtual asset service providers also known as a “travel rule”. This satisfaction with the legal framework makes MetaMUI Blockchain an ideal platform for STO (Security Token Offering) and other digital asset publications.

MetaMUI is also the most suitable blockchain platform for Central Bank Digital Currency(CBDC), Stable Coins and NFTs. MetaMUI supports 1 mil Tx / Sec and more speed depending on how parallel the nodes are connected.
With MetaMUI, it is a cloud-based digital token minting system, central banks, commercial banks and financial institutions can easily generate their own digital currencies without any programming but just with a single click of a button. MetaMUI also supports private key restoration, so if anyone loses the private key, and it can be replaceable after verifying the user’s identity to the Identity Blockchain inside MetaMUI Blockchain

For more explanation about MetaMUI, please visit our website and join our telegram group chat.
